outcomes of the LSTM and ﬁnally an output layer for making one-step predictions.
# define LSTM and output model
model.add(LSTM(n_nodes, activation=' relu' ))
model.add(Dense(n_nodes, activation=' relu' ))
model.add(Dense(1))
